title: Miso-Ginger Dressing
directions: Put all ingredients except salt and pepper into a food processor and pulse a few times to mince carrots. Then let machine run for a minute or so, until mixture is chunky-smooth. (If you want it smoother, use a blender.) Taste and add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: ¼cup peanut oil or neutral oil, like grapeseed or corn
3tablespoons mild or sweet miso, like yellow or white
1inch long piece fresh ginger, cut into coins
